thread.title: Lifelike sex robots 'with their own MINDS to get human rights'
thread.title_full: Lifelike sex robots 'with their own MINDS to get human rights'

title: Lifelike sex robots 'with their own MINDS to get human rights'
text:
++ Mindblowing sex robots ++ 
Cyborg developers have been trying to simulate the human mind for decades. 
Now a top sex robot pioneer says witty androids will be wired through an artificial intelligence app that will act as a simulation of the human mind. 
Fellas are set to meet the first sex robot with a programmable personality on April 15. 
The bots are set to be programmed in a similar way to humanoid robot Ava in hit 2015 film Ex Machina who is able to "think" through billions of online searches as an equivalent to Google. The most REALISTIC sex dolls you will ever see Saturday, 12th November 2016 Would you take one of these glamorous ladies as a girlfriend? From a blonde posing provocatively to a brunette lying seductively on her bed these bombshells look like every man’s dream partner. However, each one is in fact made from plastic. They are in fact a collection of love dolls worth between £75 and £750. 1 / 18 The bots are set to be programmed in a similar way to humanoid robot Ava “The ability to perceive somebody else's mind will be of great advantage” Murray Shanahan 
Academics discussed the potential of robotic thought process based on fictional cyborg Ava's experiences. 
Robotics boffin Murray Shanahan, of Imperial College London, said the idea human consciousness comes from social interaction is "more attractive". 
Speaking live on BBC Radio 4's Rise of the Robots, he said: "There are big questions about the evolution of human consciousness. 
"I think some of the more attractive ideas are to do with social interaction. That the ability to perceive somebody else's mind will be of great advantage. Real Sex Dolls in pictures Tuesday, 18th October 2016 A sex doll (also love doll or blow up doll) is a type of sex toy in the size and shape of a sexual partner for aid in masturbation. We take a look at the most life like dolls available in the world. 1 / 27 A visitor of the erotic fair "Venus" touches an erotic rubber doll in Berlin 
PH
